articles.author: Alaa Elassar
articles.title: Emergency alerts, desks barricading doors, shoes abandoned in the grass: How the FSU mass shooting upended the campus - CNN
articles.description: A perfect, sun-drenched spring day suddenly descended into horror when a gunman began hunting down victims near Florida State University’s student union building, marking the next chapter in America’s grim epidemic of gun violence.
articles.content:
It was an ordinary afternoon for Jayden DOnofrio, who was spending time with a friend at their apartment complex when they received a text that made their blood run cold.

articles.title: The US has a single rare earths mine. Chinese export limits are energizing a push for more - AP News
articles.description: America’s only rare earths mine has fielded calls from anxious companies since China responded to President Donald Trump's tariffs by limiting exports of seven heavy metals. The mine in California can’t meet the U.S. demand for rare earths, which is why Trump…
